1.text: Mix the borax powder and warm water together.

2.text: Add 1⁄2 cup (120 ml) of water and 1 cup of glue to a separate mixing bowl.

3.text: Add food coloring to the glue mixture (optional).

5.text: Take the slime out and have fun!

6.text: Mix 3⁄4 cup (180 ml) cornstarch with 2 cups (470 ml) vegetable oil.

7.text: Put the mixture in the refrigerator.

8.text: Remove the mixture from the refrigerator.

10.text: Pour the slime mixture out slowly into another container.

11.text: Pour a can of sweetened condensed milk into a pan.

12.text: Heat the mixture over low heat.

13.text: Remove the mixture from the heat when it has thickened.

14.text: Add 10 to 15 drops of food coloring to the mixture.

16.text: Mix 1 cup (240 ml) soap flakes with 4 cups (950 ml) hot water.

17.text: Add a few drops of food coloring (if desired).

18.text: Let the mixture stand for up to an hour.

19.text: Beat the mixture vigorously with a spoon.

20.text: Keep the slime in an airtight container.
